text: John L. Pickitt (July 30, 1933 â€“ March 14, 2020) was an American lieutenant general in the United States Air Force. He was director of the Defense Nuclear Agency from 1985 to 1987.LIEUTENANT GENERAL JOHN L. PICKITT He attended the United States Military Academy. He was born in Teague, Texas. Pickitt died on March 14, 2020 in Charlotte, North Carolina at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American generals Category:Military people from Texas
title: John L. Pickitt
